revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A new system of general geography, in which the principles of that science are explained : with a view of the solar system, and of the seasons of the year all over..."
revision.text: Possibly: A new system of general geography, in which the principles of that science are explained : with a view of the solar system, and of the seasons of the year all over the globe; together with the most essential parts of the natural history of the Earth : part I / by Ebenezer Macfait, M.D. (Edinburgh : Printed for the author, and sold by J. Balfour. W. Creech, and other booksellers, M,DCC,LXXX. [1780]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1875995~S1
